p.s: The journalist Brian Pollard explains in his article Is the usefulness of unions in the protection of workers rights coming to an end? The answer is yes why unions got harmful and unnecessary.
In this text I will analyse how the author tries to persuade the reader of his opinion.
It's noticeable that the author dodoes not start his article with an argument against unions.
Instead he tells from line 1-4 why unions are great.
In live five Brian say'ssays I've long supported unions however [...].
I think he wants to show with that, that he is not an unsocial business man and that he cares about worker rights.
Brian says [...] worker are not being exploited by employers, now employers are being exploited by employees.
He want'swants to underline with that how bad the situation got.
Brian Pollard is a talented writer.
He is combining good argument, a nice writing style and the use of stylistic devices.
I always like the idea of unions but he turned my opinion to be more critical.
